mapper.select: SELECT fname FROM menu WHERE fnum = ( SELECT fnum FROM order_spec WHERE time(osdate) BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '11:00:00' GROUP BY fnum ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1 );
SELECT fname FROM menu WHERE fnum = ( SELECT fnum FROM order_spec WHERE time(osdate) BETWEEN '11:00:01' AND '15:00:00' GROUP BY fnum ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1 );
SELECT fname FROM menu WHERE fnum = ( SELECT fnum FROM order_spec WHERE time(osdate) BETWEEN '15:00:01' AND '23:59:59' GROUP BY fnum ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1 );
